techmeme.title: During an interview, Craig Federighi says Apple looks forward to "doing integrations" with other AI models, including Google Gemini, "in the future" (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Apple introduces Messages via satellite on iOS 18, letting users send texts without a Wi-Fi or cellular connection, available on the iPhone 14 or later (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Thoughts on Apple Intelligence's ability to outsource compute to Apple's servers with cryptographic guarantees of privacy, prompt injection risks, and more (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Apple says Apple Intelligence is free and works with iOS 18 on iPhone 15 Pro, and macOS 15 and iPadOS 17 on devices with M1 or up; Vision Pro is not supported (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
Apple plans to bring ChatGPT to Siri and its other apps later in 2024; users will be asked before questions are sent to ChatGPT and don't need an OpenAI account (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
